attributes.action: Petition the Government to "make the production, sale and use of cannabis legal"
attributes.additional_details: You can look and continue reading our PETITION PAGE at: https://cannabisharm.com/legalise-cannabis/
attributes.background:
Cannabis has been proven not to be as harmful as governments want you to think. 
Legalising cannabis would not only appease the smoker, what about all other products of hemp plant. Paper, Rope, Clothing, the list is endless and reduce costs by unsightly figures.  And benefits the environment!
